sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmemoreprt ( REPRT_SJ /* */ , REPORT_DE /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , REPORTR_ID /* */ , REPORT_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT /* */ , REPORTR_INQIRE_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPRT_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #reprtSj# /* */ , #reportDe# /* */ , #wrterId# /* */ , #reportrId# /* */ , #reportCn# /* */ , #atchFileId# /* */ , #drctMatter# /* */ , #drctMatterRegistDt# /* */ , #reportrInqireDt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #reprtId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmemoreprt SET REPRT_SJ=#reprtSj# /* */ , REPORT_DE=#reportDe# /* */ , WRTER_ID=#wrterId# /* */ , REPORTR_ID=#reportrId# /* */ , REPORT_CN=#reportCn# /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID=#atchFileId# /* */ , DRCT_MATTER=#drctMatter# /* */ , DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT=#drctMatterRegistDt# /* */ , REPORTR_INQIRE_DT=#reportrInqireDt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , REPRT_ID=#reprtId# /* */ WHERE REPRT_ID=#reprtId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT REPRT_SJ /* */ , REPORT_DE /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , REPORTR_ID /* */ , REPORT_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT /* */ , REPORTR_INQIRE_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPRT_ID /* */ FROM comtnmemoreprt WHERE REPRT_ID=#reprtId# /* */

SELECT REPRT_SJ /* */ , REPORT_DE /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , REPORTR_ID /* */ , REPORT_CN /* */ , ATCH_FILE_ID /* */ , DRCT_MATTER /* */ , DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT /* */ , REPORTR_INQIRE_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , REPRT_ID /* */ FROM comtnmemoreprt WHERE 1=1
REPRT_SJ = #searchKeyword# /* */
REPORT_DE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY REPRT_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnmemoreprt WHERE 1=1
REPRT_SJ = #searchKeyword# /* */
REPORT_DE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
